result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Jury status hearing on December 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:01 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by video.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

21CF130, 2022CF000044, 2022CF000068, 2022CF000074 called

Attorney Moefu is heard on the status of the cases. 22CF136 new case has been filed. Would like to continue cases to get the new case going along with the others.
Jury status hearing scheduled for December 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Jury trial on October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Jury status hearing on September 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

9:43 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by phone.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Attorney Moefu is heard on the status of these cases. Waiting on blood test results. Global resolution. 
Attorney Steiner is heard.
Jury status hearing scheduled for September 29, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 09:00 am.

records.descr: Demand for Discovery and Inspection - Defendant

records.addlTxt: Jury status hearing on August 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

3:12 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by phone.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by phone for Peter JA Green. 

22CF68 & 22CF74

Court reviews waiver of preliminary hearing and questionnaire form with defendant. Defendant states understanding. Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing. Court accepts waiver and finds that the defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives right to preliminary hearing. 

Court finds probable cause. Atty Moefu is heard and waives reading of the information. Defendant will stand mute, upon defendant standing mute clerk will enter a not guilty plea into the record as to each count.
Jury status hearing scheduled for August 25, 2022 at 09:30 am.

10:01 AM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by video, in custody at the Lacrosse County Jail.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green. 

22CF44 / 22CF68 / 22CF74 cases called. 

22CF44  
Atty Moefu is heard on waiver. Defendant wishes to waive the preliminary hearing. 
Court reviews preliminary questionnaire and waiver of rights form with defendant. Defendant states understanding. Defendant waives right to preliminary hearing. Court accepts waiver and finds that the defendant freely, knowingly and voluntarily waives right to preliminary hearing. 

Atty Moefu is ready to proceed with arraignment. Atty Moefu waives reading of the information. Defendant will stand mute, upon defendant standing mute clerk will enter a not guilty plea into the record as to each count.  Jury Status to be scheduled for this case. 

22CF68 / 22CF74 
Atty Steiner is heard on warrant status. State requests additional cash $600.00 bond. 
Atty Moefu is heard on bond and requests a signature bond. 
Court orders that bond will leave as is for both cases and no additional bond will be added. 
Court orders warrants in each of these cases will be canceled.
Bail/bond hearing on June 1, 2022 at 10:00 am.

2:31 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green not in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin.  Attorney Lui Moefu appeared by video for Peter JA Green. 

22CF68 and 22CF74

No appearance from defendant. 
State is heard and requests a warrant and defendant to be held for further hearing. 
Court orders a warrant and defendant to be held for further hearing.

1:16 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

State is heard on bond. State requests a $1,500.00 cash bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the
defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are
positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. Defendant shall have no contact with DD. 

Defendant is heard. 

Court orders a $1,000.00 cash bond. Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the
defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are
positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. Defendant shall have no contact with DD.
Hearing scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Defendant is not to possess or consume controlled substances except those specifically prescribed to the
defendant. Defendant is to submit to random urinalysis at the request of law enforcement and if results are
positive or defendant refuses, defendant shall submit to blood draw. Defendant shall have no contact with DD

2:45 PM Call to Order by Court.  Appearances stated: Defendant Peter JA Green in court.  Attorney Luke Steiner appeared by video for State of Wisconsin. 

Court informs defendant of nature of charges and penalty sections of criminal complaint for each count.  Defendant states understanding.  Right to counsel is explained.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for May 16, 2022 at 11:15 am.
